titles.title: Victory O, Victory It Is Mine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Victory, O, victory shall be mine.
Victory, O, victory shall be mine.
If I hold my peace, let the Lord fight my battle,
Victory, O, victory shall be mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Victory, O, victory now is mine. (2x)
For I held my peace, and the Lord fought my battle.
Victory, O, victory now is mine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
/Victoria la mía, si será/(2)
Si me callo yo, dejando que en mi luche
Victoria la mía si será.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jehová la fuerza nos dará(2)
Si vivimos juntos en comunión con El
La fuerza de Dios nos sostendrá
